preferences.name: workerDir
preferences.title: Worker Directory
preferences.description: Path to the synthetics-worker directory where git commands should run.

preferences.name: gitUsername
preferences.title: Git Username
preferences.description: Used to build the branch name (e.g. username/SYNTH-1234/description).

preferences.name: jiraEmail
preferences.title: Jira Email
preferences.description: Optional (auto-fill only). Your Atlassian account email (used with the API token for Basic Auth).

preferences.name: jiraDefaultProjectKey
preferences.title: Default Jira Project Key
preferences.description: Used when you type only a number (e.g. 23559 -> SYNTH-23559).

commands.name: create-worker-branch
commands.title: Create Worker Branch from JIRA
commands.subtitle: Synthetics Execution Helper
commands.description: Create a branch from a JIRA ticket in the worker repo

commands.name: open-gitlab-pipelines
commands.title: Open GitLab Pipelines
commands.subtitle: Synthetics Execution Helper
commands.description: Open GitLab pipelines (optionally filtered by a local git branch)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
